pageContent: Purpose of review: This review will discuss erectile dysfunction in prostate cancer patients following radical prostatectomy . It will focus on the prevalence and current treatments for erectile dysfunction as well as the emotional impact of erectile dysfunction and the current psychosocial interventions designed to help patients cope with this side effect.

metaData.source:
Side effects of prostate cancer treatment are difficult to discuss, but manageable
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/9450568/
